intro: I have a Ph.D. in Computer Science. Currently working as a research and development engineer at École des Mines de Saint-Étienne, France. Member of the department of Computing and Intelligent Systems at Henry FAYOL institute.
Member of the Dataset Exchange W3C Working Group and the Autonomous Agents on the Web W3C Community Group.
You can take a look at some of my work here.
about: This is a lorem text so as not to keep the page empty. In the meantime, if you are interested, I can mention that I have a bachelor's degree in computer science as well as a master's degree in artificial intelligence from the University of Abu Bakr Belkaid in Tlemcen, Algeria.
